title: After you lose a game of League of Legends, ask yourself this question.
body:
Because this is the only reason you lose a game of League of Legends these days anyways.

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/M94SfcB02rg/hqdefault.jpg

replies.body: what a bronze thing to say

Why didn't I ban master Yi?

Well for starters I'm not bronze 5-1 I'm Silver 5 (yay, what a legend no I'm shit shut up) but anyway. Unlike the bronze league I know what a Stun, Snare Knock up, Teamwork, Binds, root and TEAMWORK <(biggest point I believe) is and the only time I cry in game is when I see a really bad play, but I don't rage at them like a 12 year old noob when they feed or don't smite or whatever.
That is only the case when you're strictly talking about Bronze V.
